defi_sdk_py.membership package

Module contents

class defi_sdk_py.membership.Membership[source]

Bases: object

Membership provides functionality to interact with the membership smart contracts.

current_pool() → str[source]

Retrieves the address of the current pool.

Returns:

The address of the current pool as a string

get_default_membership(address: str) → int[source]

Retrieves the default membership level for a given address.

Parameters:

address – The address to query the default membership level

Returns:

The default membership level as an integer

get_pool_lists() → List[str][source]

Retrieves a list of pool addresses that are part of the membership program.

Returns:

A list of pool addresses as strings

get_previous_pool() → str[source]

Retrieves the address of the previous pool.

Returns:

The address of the previous pool as a string

get_rank(nft_id: int) → int[source]

Retrieves the rank associated with a given NFT ID in the current pool.

Parameters:

nft_id – The NFT ID to query the rank

Returns:

The rank as an integer

get_rank_pool(pool: IAPHPool, nft_id: int) → int[source]

Retrieves the rank associated with a given NFT ID in a specified pool.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • nft_id – The NFT ID to query the rank

Returns:

The rank as an integer

get_refferrer(nft_id: int) → int[source]

Retrieves the referrer associated with a given NFT ID.

Parameters:

nft_id – The NFT ID to query the referrer

Returns:

The referrer as an integer

mint(referal_id: int = 0, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0) → TransactionReceipt | int[source]

Mints a new membership NFT with an optional referral ID.

Parameters:

  • referal_id – The referral ID to associate with the minting (default is 0)

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas

owner_of(nft_id: int) → str[source]

Retrieves the owner address of a specific NFT ID.

Parameters:

nft_id – The NFT ID to query the owner

Returns:

The address of the owner as a string

set_default_membership(nft_id: int, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0) → TransactionReceipt | int[source]

Sets the default membership level for the caller using a given NFT ID.

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID to set as the default membership

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas
